Articles.Content:
Good Morning KSP Fans.

Krazy Industires Aerospace:

Would formally like to announce our CONSTITUTION-01 Class Mun Rocket.

A Small Mun Landable Rocket.

Specifications.

Constructed from just 92 Parts. (9 Engines, 26 Tanks, 8 Winglets, 24 RCS Thrusters, 1 Parachute)

ASAS + RCS Systems, for complete control when landing.

55% Throttle Launch Requirment, on 8 Engines

Advisements.

Ideally Launch with ASAS Enabled.

Will happily do single straight burn to Mun at 100% Throttle.

Fuel Conservation is recommended when slowing to land on Mun.

Sadly No ASAS on return.

Sick Bags NOT included.

Laptop Friendly.
Ill pick one up, as I have been looking to try to make a munar mision with stock parts. Plus I need a good launch vehicle to get my planned Mun base up.
